scenes.voiceover: In the Neon Under-city, you don't find trouble. It finds you.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, stepping over a threshold into a dark, foggy warehouse, 4k

scenes.voiceover: Something was watching from the rafters. Something ancient.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, looking up as a massive mechanical eye glows red in the ceiling shadows, 4k

scenes.voiceover: The Iron Sentinel. A relic of the corporate wars.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, unsheathing a thermal blade as the guardian drops from the ceiling, 4k

scenes.voiceover: My bionic arm hummed. It knew the target better than I did.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, bionic left arm glowing blue with electricity, 4k
Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, dodging a massive steel claw that smashes the ground, 4k

scenes.voiceover: One hit from that, and I'm scrap metal.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, sliding under the guardian’s legs, sparks flying, 4k

scenes.voiceover: I saw the vent. The cooling core was exposed.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, adjusting tech goggles to highlight a glowing weak point on the robot, 4k

scenes.voiceover: I had one shot. I didn't plan on missing.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, leaping into the air with his bionic fist charged, 4k

scenes.voiceover: The explosion shook the foundation of the sector.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, standing amidst a massive explosion of blue sparks and smoke, 4k

scenes.voiceover: But behind the guardian, I saw something much worse.
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot of Jax, seed 882910, staring in horror as a holographic transmission of his own face appears on the wall, 4k

next_status: Jax discovers a 'Wanted' hologram featuring his own biometric data, just as sirens begin to wail in the distance.
